content.text:
HON. MARK UDALL

                              of colorado

                    in the house of representatives

                        Wednesday, July 20, 2005
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. UDALL of Colorado. Mr. Speaker, because my airline flight was 
delayed, on July 18th I was unable to be present for the vote on H. 
Res. 328, Recognizing the 25th anniversary of the workers' strikes in 
Poland in 1980 that led to the establishment of the Solidarity Trade 
Union. (rollcall number 380). Had I been present, I would have voted 
``yes.''
content.speaker: Mr. UDALL of Colorado
